data_description.name: Display name for the conversation assistant
data_description.model_url: Full URL to Qwen model API (e.g., http://192.168.0.212:8123)
data_description.fallback_keywords: Requests containing these keywords will be handled by Gemini. You can add/remove multiple keywords and enter custom values
data_description.removable_keywords: These keywords will be removed from the request before sending to Gemini (e.g., use Gemini, with Gemini, please)

init.title: Qwen Catgirl Conversation Options
init.description: Adjust Qwen Catgirl conversation assistant settings

data_description.model_url: Full URL to Qwen model API
data_description.fallback_keywords: Requests containing these keywords will bypass Qwen and go directly to Gemini. You can add/remove multiple keywords and enter custom values (e.g., play, pause, bedroom temperature, nest hub)
data_description.removable_keywords: These keywords will be removed from the request before sending to Gemini. You can add/remove multiple keywords and enter custom values (e.g., use Gemini, with Gemini, please)
